member.name: T:ChangeTracking.Entities.ChangeTrackerEntry
member.summary: Represents an Entry in the ORMs change tracker

member.name: P:ChangeTracking.Entities.ChangeTrackerEntry.Originals
member.summary: The original values of the object's properties before it was changed

member.name: P:ChangeTracking.Entities.ChangeTrackerEntry.State
member.summary: The current state of the entry

member.name: T:ChangeTracking.Entities.ChangeTrackerEntry.States
member.summary: Describes the current state of the object

member.name: F:ChangeTracking.Entities.ChangeTrackerEntry.States.Unmodified
member.summary: The object is thought to be unmodified It is still possible that it has been modified

member.name: F:ChangeTracking.Entities.ChangeTrackerEntry.States.Modified
member.summary: The object has definitely been modified

member.name: F:ChangeTracking.Entities.ChangeTrackerEntry.States.Inserted
member.summary: The object has been inserted into the ORM

member.name: F:ChangeTracking.Entities.ChangeTrackerEntry.States.Deleted
member.summary: The object has been deleted from the orm

member.name: M:ChangeTracking.Entities.ChangeTrackerEntry.UpdateOriginals(System.Object)
member.summary: Updates the original values of the object's properties after the changes are submitted
